thread.title: Roland Amory Smalls
thread.title_full: Driver Support reviewed by Roland Amory Smalls

author: Roland Amory Smalls
title: Roland Amory Smalls
text: I'M SO HAPPY THAT I'VE FOUND "DRIVER SUPPORT" BECAUSE MY COMPUTER HAS HAD THESE DRIVER ISSUES FOR A LONG TIME. I HAD TRIED A COMPANY CALLED "DRIVER ASSIST" TO NO AVAIL. AND WOULDN'T YOU KNOW, WITHIN AN HOUR OR TWO AFTER I UNINSTALLED "DRIVER ASSIST" OUT OF MY COMPUTER'S O.S. I FOUND "DRIVER SUPPORT" WHO I THOUGHT. WAS A FREE MICROSOFT SERVICE. ... BUT THAT'S OKAY. BECAUSE I'D RATHER PAY THEM THEIR REASONABLE FEE. THAN HAVE TO GO ANOTHER HOUR, WITH HAVING THE MANY DRIVERS. OF MY COMPUTER'S O.S. OUT OF SERVICE, OUT DATED OR UNDER PERFORMING. THE "DRIVERS ASSIST" WAS A FREE, MICROSOFT ASSOCIATED SERVICE. AND I DON'T KNOW? MAYBE THAT'S WHY IT "DRIVERS ASSIST" IN THE TWO WEEKS I HAD IT COULDN'T. REPAIR MY COMPUTER'S DRIVERS, PERIOD. WHEREAS "DRIVER SUPPORT" WHO IS A MICROSOFT ASSOCIATE. HAD MY COMPUTER'S DRIVES REPAIR IN LESS THAN TWO HOURS, AND THAT'S MIGHTY IMPRESSIVE. AND AGAIN I'M SO HAPPY, AS A RESULT OF THEIR EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE, EXPERTISE AND EFFICIENCY...
